about_the_game:
Let your heroes enjoy some winter and fall holidays with the Fantasy Dreamland - Festival Pack! ELV Games is here with a specialized pixel art tileset to help you add some new festivities to your game. Let your heroes can enjoy wintery presents, haunted fall nights, and visit the local blacksmith’s shop!

Blacksmith Workshop tileset:

- Blacksmith Workshop tiles for your game
- Animated water
- Animated doors
- Multiple type of auto tiles
- Blacksmith house
- Different type of roofs
- Customizable house
- House interior
- Variety of colors
- Lots of props

Festival tilesets:

- Halloween decorations for your game
- Animated torches
- Animated spider decoration
- Animated bat decoration
- Animated ghost decoration
- Halloween trees
- Halloween pumpkin
- Christmas decorations for your game
- New tree type for Fantasy Dreamland
- Trees with decorations for Christmas
- Big and small snowman
- Presents

Note: Halloween and Christmas doesn't include the houses, only decorations

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
